name: SinLoon PCIe 4.0 X1 Extension Cable 90 Degree PCI-E 1X Male to Female Riser Cable (30CM)
short_description: 【PCIe 4.0 X1】PCI-Express 4.0 X1 bandwidth speeds up to 16Gbps, backwards compatible with PCIe 3.0/2.0/1.0.
【Widely Used】PCIe X1 riser cable to support various PCIe cards, such as 2.5G diskless boot cards, remote switch cards, capture cards, SSD RAID cards,etc.
【PCIe X1 Female】PCIe X1 female socket allows installation of PCIe X1/X4/X8/X16 adapters, but only up to PCIe X1 speeds.

【High Quality】X1 gold finger is made of gold dipping process, the gold thickness can be up to 3U, better electrical performance and improved service life. High quality TPE cable body, soft and durable, not easy to damage.

【Note】To avoid damage to the device, ensure that the installation direction is correct. Due to the delicate structure of the magnetic core inside the product, please hold the PCB hardware part during the disassembly process to avoid damaging the magnetic core. Does not support hot-plugging (when installing this product, please make sure the motherboard is powered off first).

name: Cooler Master MasterAccessory Vertical GPU Card Holder Kit V3 Black, Premium Riser Cable PCI-E 4.0 x16-165mm, PCIe 3.0 Compatible, Adjustable Length for E-ATX|ATX|Micro ATX Case (MCA-U000R-KFVK03)
short_description: PCIe 4.0 Riser Cable Works seamlessly with PCIe 4.0 and 5.0 motherboards and GPUs, delivering fast, reliable performance in gaming or creative tasks.
Fits Standard ATX Cases Designed to handle modern 3-slot GPUs while fitting seamlessly into most traditional 7-slot ATX cases.
Removable M-ATX Bracket Bracket can be removed to fit seamlessly into most traditional 4-slot Micro-ATX cases. Note: May block rear fan in some cases.
Toolless, Adjustable Easily adjusts up to 65mm horizontally and 30mm toward the side panel—no tools needed.
Flexible Installation Allows the GPU to be installed after the holder is secured in your preferred position.
product_description: Give your case a clean, modern look with Cooler Master’s Vertical GPU Holder Kit V3. Compatible with most mATX and ATX cases, this updated design fits a wide range of setups. It includes a PCIe 4.0 riser cable for easy, high-speed installation. The bracket adjusts up to 65mm forward and 30mm toward the side panel—no tools needed—giving you more flexibility and better GPU fit.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #3,599 in Computer Accessories & Peripherals

name: LINKUP PCIE 5.0 Riser Cable | for Vertical GPU Mount | Right Angle | Graphics Card GPU Ready | Usable with PCIe 4.0 & RX 9070/ RTX5090 | 20cm (Total Length: 24cm)
short_description: Verified Compatibility — Built for vertical GPU mount and standard layouts across towers, SFF/ITX sandwich cases, open benches, and water-cooled rigs. Fully backward-compatible with PCIe 4.0 and validated on ASUS WS WRX80SE WiFi II and WRX90E Gen5 boards. Ready for next-gen cards like RTX 5090 and RX 9070. Use this PCIe 5.0 riser cable to place the GPU exactly where airflow and aesthetics demand—without giving up stability.

Gen5 x16 Performance & Shielding — Delivers full 128GB/s on PCIe 5.0 x16 with tuned impedance, premium conductors, and multilayer shielding to suppress crosstalk and EMI. The AVA design targets clean eye margins under load and tight bends, making it a dependable PCIe Gen5 riser cable for high-FPS gaming, AI, and storage workflows. Replace Gen 3 and Gen 4 PCIe cables while preserving upgrade headroom for future GPUs.

Showcase Aesthetics, Improve Cooling — Move the card where it breathes. A vertical mount GPU clears intake for thick shrouds & radiators, reducing heat soak & noise while giving builds a clean, gallery-style look. Route like a tidy GPU extension cable & keep clocks steady thanks to robust shielding & low-loss geometry. Builders report good quality & that it simply works great when paired with the right bracket and case layout. View Product Description to ensure Compatibility with your PC case.

Installation Instructions — Measure with a string from the motherboard slot to the GPU PCB to pick the correct span. Seat connectors fully until latched; Fold & Flex in any way. Use standoffs and support brackets if the chassis requires it. If fit seems tight, contact us before forcing parts—we’ll advise the best path for your case model. Clear guidance turns this into a straightforward PCIe cable install, even in cramped ITX routes.

Choose the right Cable — Choose a length between 2–35.4 inches (see Installation Instruction) and the connector you need: right angle, straight, left angle, double reverse, single reverse right, single reverse left, or single reverse straight. One family covers ITX sandwiches, server trays, and vertical displays. Consistent Gen5 signal integrity across sizes makes it a flexible PCIe extender or GPU riser cable for clean cable management today with room to evolve tomorrow.
product_details: Compatible Devices ‎4000 Series, 5000 Series, 5L-V2.2 V2.3, 7000 Series, Cannon, Core P3 Pro (New)
Compatible Phone Models ‎No Compatible Phone Models

name: GLOTRENDS 100mm PCIe 3.0 X1 Riser Cable for M.2, WiFi, Firewire, USB, Sound Cards, etc
short_description: PCI-Express 3.0 X1 to X1 extension cable
Dual 90 degree right angle: 90 degree right angle at X1 male interface, and 90 degree right angle at X1 female interface.
PCIe X1 female interface can be installed with PCIe X1/X4/X8/X16 adapter, but only PCIe X1 speed.
8Gbps speed at max for PCI-Express 3.0 X1 bandwidth, backward compatible with PCIe 2.0/1.0. (Note: can not support PCIe 4.0 feature)
36PIN full function PCIe X1 cable, support all kinds of PCIe cards, such as 2.5G Diskless Boot Card, Remote Switch Card, Capture Card, SSD RAID card, etc.
The EMI-shielded design ensures signal integrity and stable performance.
product_details: Cable Type ‎The core is tinned copper wrapped in Teflon with a PVC protective coating on the outside

name: PCIe X1 4.0 Riser Cable,PCI-Express 1X Male to Female Extension Cable PCI-e Extender Adapter(10cm/3.94inch)
short_description: PCI-E 1X Riser Cable with Ultra-Fast Data Transfer Speed, Supports PCIe 4.0, Stable Transmission Even at High Frequencies
Dual 90-Degree Right Angle Design: Features a 90-degree male PCIe X1 connector and a 90-degree female PCIe X1 connector, making it compatible with a wide range of applications and environments.

High-Speed PCIe 4.0 Bandwidth: Supports a maximum data transfer speed of 16Gbps, while being backward compatible with PCIe 3.0, 2.0, and 1.0 standards. The open-ended female connector design allows for the installation of PCIe X1/X4/X8/X16 adapters and devices such as 2.5G diskless boot cards, remote switch cards, capture cards, SSD RAID cards, and GPUs (limited to PCIe X1 bandwidth).
36-Pin Full-Function PCIe X1 Cable: Crafted with high-quality flexible cable, it is extremely soft, compact, and easy to install and use.

Durable and Secure Construction: The PCB is reinforced with bolts and nuts to prevent tearing or short circuits at the cable solder points.The inner core features pure copper with tin plating for maximum signal transmission speed, while the shielding layer is made of TPE plastic with PE insulation to protect against electromagnetic interference during data transfer.

name: PCIE 4.0 Riser Cable 90 Degree, PCIe 4.0 x16 High Speed Flexible Extender Card, EMI Shielded 30AWG, TPE Cable Sleeves, Pcie 4.0 Riser Compatible with 4090 4080 4070 3090 and Pcie 3.0 System 20cm
short_description: Compatible with all of the PCI-E Device and Graphics Cards: Includes the new RTX series such as RTX4090, RTX4070ti, RTX3090ti, RTX3090 , and MORE.

PCIe 4.0 compatible: The Gen 4.0 riser cable delivers double the PCIe 3.0 bandwidth, fully supporting backward compatibility, and transfer rates of over 64Gb/s (bi-directional) with PCIe 4.0 devices at 16GT/s bit rate.

EMI shielded 30 AWG Copper Wires: The wire features EMI anti-electromagnetic interference design, strong shielding, effectively preventing issues like crashes, frame drops, and instability during graphics card usage.

3U Gold-Plated Pin Connections: Gold-plated PCI pins offer maximum durability, improved signal transmission and stability, longer plug-in lifespan, reliable electrical performance, and enhanced work efficiency.
Ultra-Flexible Cable Sleeves: The revised TPE cable sleeves offer maximum flexibility and durability, perfect for the tightest cable routing jobs.

name: PCIe 5.0 Riser Cable | RTX5090 RTX4090 RX9070 RX7900 GPU Ready | Compatible with PCIe 5.0/4.0 GPU | 90 Degree Right Angle for Vertical GPU Mount| Flexible PVC Gpu Riser Cable 200mm Black
short_description: Lossless PCIe 5.0 Performance: PCIe 5.0 Riser Cable designed for high-bandwidth Gen5 signal integrity; fully compatible with RTX5090(ti) and RX9070(xt) ; vertical mounting improves airflow to reduce heat buildup and extend GPU lifespan
EMI Shielding for Stable Signals: Built with anti-interference materials to minimize signal loss; prevents crashes, frame drops, and instability during intensive workloads

Robust 78W Power Delivery: Features 30AWG tinned copper wires with 40 pins (10 for 12V power, 6 for 3.3V); The number of copper wires has been greatly increased to ensure stable power supply under heavy loads

Flexible PVC Cable Design, No Creases: Highly elastic PVC outer sheath material is used to make the wire body soft and easy to bend; adapts to tight spaces while maintaining clean cable management over time
6-Layer Gold-Plated PCB: M7-grade low-loss materials withstand high temperatures; 5-micron gold plating preserves signal integrity; ultrasonic-sealed housing prevents oxidation and loose connections

Gold-Plated Connector: Using 30u gold-plated 5.0 shielded connector, the transmission rate is faster and the signal is more stable; Prevents unstable operation caused by loose equipment and prevents blue screen and crash
